structure.unit: Registration Of Certain Professions And Occupations

law.catch_line: Transferability And Validity Of License; Review Of Denial Of Issuance Or Renewal; Supervision Or Revocation Of License
law.text: A nursing home administratorâ€™s license shall not be transferable and shall be valid until surrendered for cancellation or suspended or revoked for violation of any laws or regulations relating to the proper management and administration of a nursing home. Any denial of issuance or renewal, suspension or revocation of a license shall be subject to review upon the timely request of the licensee and pursuant to chapter thirty A.
